page.title: 15Golf in Carnoustie
page.content: A great tourist attraction to many golfers visiting Carnoustie is {Simpson's Golf Shop.}The shop has nearly every golfing need you could think of.Recently a new owner has taken over the running of the shop, until then it had always been owned by a local Carnoustie family. The shop is 102 years old and in the beginning clubs were made there.Nowa- days you can see old pictures of men cleaning the clubs in the shop. The dearest set of golf clubs that the present owner has ever sold was Â£410.00.The most popular set of clubs which he sells are those made by Swilken of St.Andrews,the home of golf.However,for beginners,he re- commends a good second-hand set. On average about 80 customers a day visit the shop. The average age is about 40.Many are American women.
